summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Autodestroy PDF Platform - all core features working correctly. Backend APIs functioning properly, frontend authentication flow successful, navigation working, and UI design is professional and responsive.

design_issues.issue: Using system fonts (Manrope, -apple-system) instead of custom brand typography

passed_tests: Subscription plans endpoint returns all plans (basic, pro, enterprise)
Get current user info endpoint works
Landing page loads with hero section and features
Navigation between pages (landing → pricing → register → login → dashboard)
Dashboard displays user stats and subscription alert
Responsive design works on mobile and tablet
CTA buttons and interactive elements work

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor design enhancement needed
